sense.name: figure out by (numerical) computation
sense.examples: How do you calculate the area of a circle? We must measure and calculate to determine how much paint will be needed. The cost of the damage caused by the recent storms has been calculated at 5 million. The new tax system would be calculated on the value of property owned by an individual. At some stage we need to calculate when the project will be finished. He's calculated that it would take him two years to save up enough for a car.

sense.name: think or evaluate, judge to be probable
sense.commentary: Make a judgement based on circumstance, common sense, or other non-numerical evidences.
sense.examples: I calculate he'll never make a farmer. Grandma calculated it will rain tomorrow. He calculated the impact such behavior would have upon the rest of human history.

sense.name: design for a specific purpose
sense.examples: This line of automobile is calculated to last for years It was choice that was calculated to please the public. He prepared a speech calculated to reassure investors.

sense.name: count or depend on someone or something
sense.commentary: Syntax Is: NP1 CALCULATE ON NP2
sense.examples: We're calculating on your help. We're calculating on about 30 guests.
